reference.title: The visualization is distracting
reference.shortdesc: There are squiggly lines all over the DITA map. It is distracting.

refbody.section: ProblemToo many visualization properties are enabled.

SolutionYou can either turn off visualization or specify only the visualization properties that you want to use.
To turn off the visualization, click View Hide All Visualization .
To specify visualization, use the Property Visualization view.
